content: mittens are one of those little magical objects that comfort and warm us up and even a little more than our fingertips when they have been knitted with love it was to protect my son s chubby hands that i made this little rounded design 1 a little more than ten years ago with a pretty gusseted thumb which turned out to be particularly ergonomic and perfect for staying agile while being warm for this 2022 version i have chosen to revisit the pattern with our yarn pénélope 2 for its roundness which highlights the thumb design and its luxurious softness which easily transforms the little knitted things into a very appreciated gift potential these mittens could be matched with the kled 3 cowl for example for a nice outfit to put under the tree sizes 1-2 yr 3-5 yr 6-8 yr 8-12 yr
